segments.text: Your prices seem a little high .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We could make it lower for you . What's your counter-offer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We make a counter-offer to you of $ 150 per metric ton F . O . B . London .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you order in large lots , we'll accept the price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . We will increase our order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , as a token of friendship , we accept your counter-offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad that we've settled the price .
segments.speaker: S1
